entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow. A few rain showers early this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
